targets.query:
lastValue = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: int(v: "${block_start_num}"), stop: int(v: "${block_end_num}"))
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BlockTimestamp")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with block: uint(v: r._time) / uint(v :1000000000) }))
|> keep(columns: ["block", "_value"])
|> last()

firstValue = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|> range(start: int(v: "${block_start_num}"), stop: int(v: "${block_end_num}"))
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BlockTimestamp")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with block: uint(v: r._time) / uint(v :1000000000) }))
|> keep(columns: ["block", "_value"])
|> first()

union(tables: [firstValue, lastValue])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "block"])

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
  |>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["event_type"]== "protocol")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],          
      columnKey: ["_field"],     
      valueColumn: "_value"    
  )
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"]) 
  |> count(column: "event_type") 
  |> group() 
  |> rename(columns: {event_type: "count"})

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>keep(columns: ["block", "committee", "proposer", "skipped-proposer"])
|>group()
|>sort(columns:["block"], desc:true)
|> limit(n:1000)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>keep(columns: ["block", "ap-absentees", "qc-absentees", "num-qc-absentees", "num-ap-absentees"])
|>group()
|>sort(columns:["block"], desc:true)
|> limit(n:1000)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>keep(columns: ["_time",  "num-qc-absentees"])

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>keep(columns: ["_time", "num-ap-absentees"])

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
 |>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"]== "Penalized")
 |> pivot(
     rowKey:["_time"],         
     columnKey: ["_field"],    
     valueColumn: "_value"   
 )
 |> group(columns: ["block"])
 |> count(column: "event_type")
 |> group()
 |> rename(columns: {event_type: "count"})
 |> map(fn: (r)=> ({block:r.block, penalized:r.count}))

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
 |>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"]== "InactivityJailingEvent")
 |> pivot(
     rowKey:["_time"],         
     columnKey: ["_field"],    
     valueColumn: "_value"   
 )
 |> group(columns: ["block"])
 |> count(column: "event_type")
 |> group()
 |> rename(columns: {event_type: "count"})
 |> map(fn: (r)=> ({block:r.block, inactivityJaillingEvent:r.count}))

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: $__from/1000, stop: $__to/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="BlockHeader")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>drop(columns: ["_time", "committee", "proposer", "ap-absentees", "qc-absentees"])
|>group()
|>sort(columns:["block"], desc:true)
|> limit(n:1000)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "QuorumCertificateAbsentees")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "absent")
  |> group(columns: ["validator"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ActivityProofAbsentees")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "absent")
  |> group(columns: ["validator"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="ACNPeers")
|>pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> drop (columns: ["_time"])
|> group()
|> limit(n:1000)

panels.description: Emitted after updating config parameter of type uint

targets.query:
from(bucket:"${bucket}")
|>range(start: ${__from}/1000, stop: ${__to}/1000)
|>filter(fn:(r)=>r["_measurement"]=="ConfigUpdateUint")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|>group(columns:["event_id_seer"])
|>group()
|> drop (columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "event_id_seer", "event_type"])
|>sort(columns: ["block"], desc: true)
|>limit(n:10000)

|>group(columns:["event_id_seer"])
|>group()
|> drop (columns: ["_time", "_measurement", "event_id_seer", "event_type"])
|>sort(columns:["block"], desc:true)
|>limit(n:1000)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
			|>range(start: -1y)
			|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"]=="LastProcessed")
			|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
			|> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
			|> group()
			|> limit(n: 1000)

from(bucket:"${bucket}")
			|>range(start: -1y)
			|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"]=="LastProcessed")
			|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
			|> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
			|> group()
			|> limit(n: 1000)
